channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tencent posts better-than-expected 47% profit surge as games, AI tools shine
item.description: Chinese gaming and social media giant Tencent on Wednesday reported profit above analysts' expectations, while revenue missed slightly.

item.title: Gold Futures Slide on Strengthening Yields, U.S. Dollar
item.description: Gold futures fell again on concerns about potentially restrictive U.S. monetary policy in 2025 under Trump.

item.title: Super Micro shares plunge 17% after company says no timetable for annual results, issues weak guidance
item.description: Super Micro, the embattled server maker, reported preliminary first-quarter results on Tuesday.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock surges almost 30% to near all-time high after company's Q3 results
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Cisco reports fourth straight quarter of declining revenue
item.description: Cisco reported better-than-expected results for the latest quarter but revenue continues to shrink.

item.title: Stock Waver and Dollar Extends Rally
item.description: The Dow industrials, S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite were switching from modest gains to small losses after the producer price index increased 0.2% last ...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Inventories Rise As Expected
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures dropped after U.S. inventories increased in line with expectations.

item.title: Euro Likely to Fall Further on ECB-Fed Divergence
item.description: The euro fell to a 13-month low against the dollar and is likely to weaken further as the ECB could cut interest rates more aggressively than the Fed,...

item.title: Disney stock surges on streaming growth, guidance
item.description: Revenue for Disney's entertainment segment – which includes the traditional TV networks, direct-to-consumer streaming and films – increased 14% year o...

item.title: The Big Problem for Saudi Arabia's Futuristic City? The Country Doesn't Have Enough Money
item.description: The price tag for Saudi Arabia’s ambitious plans runs into the trillions of dollars if fully built, far more than the country’s $1 trillion wealth fun...
